name: StarMoney Encrypted Document
summary: Learn about .PDY files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Star Money is a German-based application that allows you to manage your banking information. The software utilizes the proprietary PDY format to protect sensitive information, whether it be personal or financial in your scanned documents.
After you scan a document with the Windows desktop version of StarMoney, the application saves it as a PDY file in the following location (beginning with StarMoney 7.0):

instructions: You can only open PDY files with the Windows version of Star Finanz StarMoney, and you must provide the proper credentials to open the file to decrypt it.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
